recipe_name: Asparagus and lettuce with prawns and sesame and soy dressing
author: Paul Rankin
method: Blanch the asparagus in boiling salted water for 3-4 minutes, adding the lettuce leaves for the last minute. Drain. Heat one tablespoon of the sesame oil in a frying pan and fry the prawns for two minutes, or until they turn pink all over. To serve, arrange the asparagus and lettuce on a serving plate. Place the prawns on top and sprinkle over the chilli. Drizzle with the remaining tablespoon of sesame oil and the soy sauce.
ingredients: 1 bunch asparagus, trimmed,  2 Little Gem lettuce leaves,  2 tbsp sesame oil,  2 raw tiger prawns, peeled and deveined,  1 red chilli, deseeded and roughly chopped,  1 tbsp soy sauce
